title: samaney
author: samaney
content: Hello. I am not a crypto trader or something similar. I only want to send money to my forex broker and it allow capital wallet for payment. I will be using USDT (because I will use it as a payment vehicle and it is stable). What is the best method to purchase USDT via Mercury Bank in USA (I will also have debit card and can make also make wire payment). Which service do you advise me to purchase USDT? My Binance account is for Turkey and I did not see email or support of Binance. Which service can I use other than Binance?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: I'm not sure if this is just your way to promote Capitalwallet like this user did a few months back[1] or if you really want to know, but assuming the latter, do you trust whoever you're sending the funds to? What do you mean by they allow capital wallet for payments? Do you need to make an account there and deposit funds? or you're paying for a service that uses Capitalwallet as a payment processor?Now regarding your second question. If you're from Turkey, you can just make an account on OKX, and buy using your card. Or if you want to use wire transfers, you can try their P2P platform.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5259548.msg61345763#msg61345763
